content:
How can you get or update a flow chat with AI
Open Claude or something AI platform Input your demand or upload your flow chat ,than tell AI to get Mermaid Picture You will get a nice beautiful flow chat like this :(I use chatNext with Claude API) graph TDA[User Visits Landing Page] --> B{Interested?}B -->|Yes| C[Explore Content]B -->|No| D[Exit Page]C --> E{Call to Action}E -->|Sign Up| F[Registration Form]E -->|Learn More| G[Additional Information]E -->|Contact Us| H[Contact Form]F --> I[Thank You Page]G --> EH --> J[Confirmation Message] ​
summary: How can you get or update a flow chat with AI
title: With AI to get a nice flow chat

From my view , zero-shot more like a Q&A ,a question a answer.
when I input ,llm begin work and then it will tell me about mine input

LLM enhance result:
From my perspective, zero-shot resembles a Q&A format, where each question is followed by an answer.
When I input a query, the language model begins working and then provides feedback on my input.
